TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 将类实例序列化为 SOAP 编码的 XML 时，控制 生成的架构。

span.span: Controls the schema generated by the when a class instance is serialized as SOAP encoded XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化为编码的 SOAP XML 的对象。The class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML. 生成的 XML 符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档"简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 1.1"的第 5 节。The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1". 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性 That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 若要编码的 SOAP 消息将对象序列化为，构造使用附带方法的类。To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, construct the using an created with the method of the class. 仅应用于类声明。The can only be applied to class declarations. 属性确定是否生成 XML 元素类型包含在生成的 XML 流的 XML 架构文档 (.xsd)。The property determines whether the resulting XML element type is included in the XML Schema document (.xsd) for the generated XML stream. 若要查看架构，请将该类编译为 DLL 文件。To see the schema, compile the class into a DLL file. 将生成的文件作为参数传递[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。Pass the resulting file as an argument to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将生成的实例序列化类时生成的 XML 流的 XML 架构类。The tool generates the XML Schema for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized by an instance of the class. 设置不同的命名空间会导致 Xsd.exe 要写入序列化类时生成的 XML 流的不同架构 (.xsd) 文件。Setting a different namespace causes Xsd.exe to write a different schema (.xsd) file for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于类，与设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class, with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时重写类型的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 将对象分配给的属性并添加到。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 请参阅有关重写的 SOAP 序列化的更多详细信息的类概述。See the class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时重写类型的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 将对象分配给的属性并添加到。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 请参阅有关重写的 SOAP 序列化的更多详细信息的类概述。See the class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

param.span: 序列化类实例时生成（和在反序列化类实例时识别）的 XML 类型的名称。

param.span: 类型的 XML 命名空间。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定类型的名称和 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name and XML namespace of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时重写类型的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 将对象分配给的属性并添加到。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 请参阅重写的 SOAP 序列化的更多详细信息的类概述。See the class overview for more details on overriding SOAP serialization. 如果您设置多个类型的值 (即，如果将特性应用于多个类与其他为每个值)，则[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)生成单独的每种类型的架构文件 (.xsd)。If you set a value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type. 这是因为对于每种类型设置不同的命名空间呈现每个类型不同于其他，从而使每个要写为一个独立的实体类型。This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeInSchema { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在 SOAP 编码的 XML 架构文档中包括该类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents.

value.span: 要在 SOAP 编码的“XML 架构”文档中包括该类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用到类声明，以指定是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class declaration to specify whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看设置的属性的结果类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将写入架构，包括的类型定义的类进行序列化时生成的 XML 流。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition of the XML stream generated when the class is serialized. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 类型的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML type.
The namespace of the XML type.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您设置多个类型的值 (即，如果将特性应用于多个类与其他为每个值)，则[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)生成单独的每种类型的架构文件 (.xsd)。If you set a value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type. 这是因为对于每种类型设置不同的命名空间呈现每个类型不同于其他，从而使每个要写为一个独立的实体类型。This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML type.
The name of the XML type.
The default is the class name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用于类，以指定的 XML 类型命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML Schema document. 若要查看设置结果对象的属性，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the object's properties, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将写入架构，包括类型定义。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 应用于与类设置为"SoapGroupType"。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 还将重写，更改到"团队"。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 这两个版本进行序列化，从而在两个文件：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]
